title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       A wide variety of employment opportunities await you at Valles Caldera National Preserve. About 50 full-time equivalent positions make up the preserve staff, in fields including administration, education and interpretation, law enforcement, maintenance, resource management and science, and visitor services. Preserve employees work outdoors or in the office, behind the scenes or directly with the public, seasonally or year round. Every role is vital for the preserve to fulfill its mission of preserving natural and cultural resources for future generations while providing meaningful experiences for preserve visitors.    All National Park Service jobs are listed on USAJobs. Applicants must submit a specific application, within a specific time frame, for every position available. There is not a "generic" application for positions, nor is there a "standing file" for positions. Valles Caldera National Preserve consistently receives more applications than there are available positions. Only United States citizens may be considered for government positions with the National Park Service. All applicants receive consideration without regard to race, color, sex, religion, age, or national origin. Generally, employees must be 18 years of age.
